name: Uprooted (Melisa, BraveGuys42, V0V1, Taco-Alp, Sonya Panaccione)
name_original: Uprooted (Melisa, BraveGuys42, V0V1, Taco-Alp, Sonya Panaccione)
description:
In this emotional game, help Jenard, a lively tree, reunite with his lover who he has been tragically separated from.

This game was created for the Concordia 48-hour game jam, and for GGJ.

Creators: Melisa, Sonya, Vi, Zaid, Alp

Location: Montreal

Instructions:

Walk: Right and left arrows / WASD

"Root" to hide from enemies: Spacebar

Art: All drawings and animations are original.

Audio:

Sound FX are taken from FreeSound at freesound.org

and ZAPSPLAT at zapsplat.com

Les Cygnes (The Swan) by the Carnival Animals

Greensleeves by lesfm.net

Cat Burglars by Eric Matyas at soundimage.org

GGJ Diversifiers (5)

- Making memories (Sponsored by dot big bang)

- Sharing is caring (Sponsored by GitHub)
